scripts.build: npm run openapi && npm run codegen
scripts.codegen: openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./openapi.json -o ./src/sdk -g typescript-axios -p typescriptFourPlus=true -p useSingleRequestParameter=true -p supportsES6=true && npx replace-in-file "/* tslint:disable */" "/* tslint:disable */ // @ts-nocheck */" src/sdk/*
